title: Anti-ample bundle, nef vector bundle, big vector bundle
authors: Indranil Biswas, Fatima Laytimi, D. S. Nagaraj, Werner Nahm
abstract:
We prove that the direct image of an anti-ample vector bundle is anti-ample
under any finite flat morphism of non-singular projective varieties. In the
second part we prove some properties of big and nef vector bundles. In
particular it is shown that the tensor product of a nef vector bundle with a
nef and big vector bundle is again nef and big. This generalizes a result of
Schneider.
